languages.text: {n}Элина звонко цыкает.{/n} "Регент Ааронто повинен в массовых убийствах, запугивании, нечеловеческих пытках, пособничеству Тисифоне и взращиванию ее наследницы. Во многом — но не в этом. Как бы я ни хотела увидеть его голову на эшафоте — мне не позволит честь оклеветать его на суде {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Элина звонко цыкает.{/n} "Регент Ааронто повинен в массовых убийствах, запугивании, нечеловеческих пытках, пособничеству Тисифоне и взращиванию ее наследницы. Во многом — но не в этом. Как бы я ни хотела увидеть его голову на эшафоте — мне не позволит честь оклеветать его на суде {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}".
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: {n}Elina clicks her tongue loudly.{/n} "Regent Aaronto is guilty of mass killings, intimidation, inhuman torture, abetting Tisiphone, and raising her heir. His crimes are many, but this one is not among them. I'd love to see his head on the chopping block, but honour prohibits me from slandering him in a trial before the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."
languages.original_text: {n}Элина звонко цыкает.{/n} "Регент Ааронто повинен в массовых убийствах, запугивании, нечеловеческих пытках, пособничеству Тисифоне и взращиванию ее наследницы. Во многом — но не в этом. Как бы я ни хотела увидеть его голову на эшафоте — мне не позволит честь оклеветать его на суде {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольного Торговца{/g}".

languages.text: {n}埃琳娜响亮地弹着舌头。{/n}“阿伦托摄政王犯下了无数罪行，包括大规模屠杀、恐吓、非人道的折磨、教唆提西福涅，以及抚养她的继承人。他犯下过许多罪行，但这件事情他确实不知情。我很希望能有人把他的脑袋砍下来，但我的荣誉感禁止我在{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的审判中诽谤他。”
languages.original_text: {n}Elina clicks her tongue loudly.{/n} "Regent Aaronto is guilty of mass killings, intimidation, inhuman torture, abetting Tisiphone, and raising her heir. His crimes are many, but this one is not among them. I'd love to see his head on the chopping block, but honour prohibits me from slandering him in a trial before the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}埃琳娜响亮地弹着舌头。{/n}“阿伦托摄政王犯下了无数罪行，包括大规模屠杀、恐吓、非人道的折磨、教唆提西福涅，以及抚养她的继承人。他犯下过许多罪行，但这件事情他确实不知情。我很希望能有人把他的脑袋砍下来，但我的荣誉感禁止我在{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}的审判中诽谤他。”
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: {n}Elina chasquea sonoramente la lengua.{/n} «El regente Aaronto es culpable de asesinatos en masa, intimidación, torturas inhumanas, ayudar a Tisiphone y criar a su heredera. Sus crímenes son numerosos, pero este no es uno de ellos. Y aunque me gustaría ver su cabeza en el tocón del verdugo, el honor me impide calumniarlo en un juicio ante un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}».
languages.original_text: {n}Elina clicks her tongue loudly.{/n} "Regent Aaronto is guilty of mass killings, intimidation, inhuman torture, abetting Tisiphone, and raising her heir. His crimes are many, but this one is not among them. I'd love to see his head on the chopping block, but honour prohibits me from slandering him in a trial before the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elina chasquea sonoramente la lengua.{/n} «El regente Aaronto es culpable de asesinatos en masa, intimidación, torturas inhumanas, ayudar a Tisiphone y criar a su heredera. Sus crímenes son numerosos, pero este no es uno de ellos. Y aunque me gustaría ver su cabeza en el tocón del verdugo, el honor me impide calumniarlo en un juicio ante un{mf||a} {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}».
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: {n}エリナは大きく舌打ちする。{/n}「摂政アーロントは、大量殺人、脅迫、非人道的な拷問、ティシフォンの教唆、彼女の後継者を育てた罪を犯している。彼の罪はたくさんあるけれど、これはその中には含まれない。彼の首を刎ねてみたいものだけど、名誉のために{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の前で彼を傷つけることはしないわ」
languages.original_text: {n}Elina clicks her tongue loudly.{/n} "Regent Aaronto is guilty of mass killings, intimidation, inhuman torture, abetting Tisiphone, and raising her heir. His crimes are many, but this one is not among them. I'd love to see his head on the chopping block, but honour prohibits me from slandering him in a trial before the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}エリナは大きく舌打ちする。{/n}「摂政アーロントは、大量殺人、脅迫、非人道的な拷問、ティシフォンの教唆、彼女の後継者を育てた罪を犯している。彼の罪はたくさんあるけれど、これはその中には含まれない。彼の首を刎ねてみたいものだけど、名誉のために{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}自由開拓者{/g}の前で彼を傷つけることはしないわ」
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: {n}Elina schnalzt laut mit der Zunge.{/n} "Regent Aaronto hat sich vieler Dinge schuldig gemacht: Massenmord, Einschüchterung, unmenschliche Folter, Komplizenschaft mit Tisiphone und Aufzucht ihrer Erbin. Seine Verbrechen sind zahlreich, aber dieses gehört nicht dazu. Ich würde seinen Kopf gerne auf dem Richterblock sehen, aber meine Ehre verbietet es mir, ihn bei einem Prozess vor {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin}{/g} zu verleumden."
languages.original_text: {n}Elina clicks her tongue loudly.{/n} "Regent Aaronto is guilty of mass killings, intimidation, inhuman torture, abetting Tisiphone, and raising her heir. His crimes are many, but this one is not among them. I'd love to see his head on the chopping block, but honour prohibits me from slandering him in a trial before the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elina schnalzt laut mit der Zunge.{/n} "Regent Aaronto hat sich vieler Dinge schuldig gemacht: Massenmord, Einschüchterung, unmenschliche Folter, Komplizenschaft mit Tisiphone und Aufzucht ihrer Erbin. Seine Verbrechen sind zahlreich, aber dieses gehört nicht dazu. Ich würde seinen Kopf gerne auf dem Richterblock sehen, aber meine Ehre verbietet es mir, ihn bei einem Prozess vor {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu verleumden."
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: {n}Élina fait claquer sa langue.{/n} « En plus d'avoir soutenu Tisiphone et élevé sa successeure, le régent Aaronto s'est rendu coupable de nombreux crimes, parmi lesquels le meurtre de masse, l'intimidation ou la torture. Cependant, il est innocent dans cette affaire. Rien ne me ferait plus plaisir que de voir sa tête sur le billot, mais mon honneur m'interdit de le calomnier devant {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}{/g}. »
languages.original_text: {n}Elina clicks her tongue loudly.{/n} "Regent Aaronto is guilty of mass killings, intimidation, inhuman torture, abetting Tisiphone, and raising her heir. His crimes are many, but this one is not among them. I'd love to see his head on the chopping block, but honour prohibits me from slandering him in a trial before the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Élina fait claquer sa langue.{/n} « En plus d'avoir soutenu Tisiphone et élevé sa successeure, le régent Aaronto s'est rendu coupable de nombreux crimes, parmi lesquels le meurtre de masse, l'intimidation ou la torture. Cependant, il est innocent dans cette affaire. Rien ne me ferait plus plaisir que de voir sa tête sur le billot, mais mon honneur m'interdit de le calomnier devant {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}{/g}. »
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: {n}Elina, dilini duyulacak şekilde şaklatıyor.{/n} "Naip Aaronto; toplu katliamlardan, sindirme operasyonlarından, insanlık dışı işkencelerden, Tisiphone'ye yardakçılık etmekten ve onun vârisini yetiştirmekten suçludur. İşlediği suçları saymaya kalksak sonu gelmez. Bu suçu ise işlememiştir. Kellesini kütükte görmeyi çok istesem de {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} karşısında yargılanırken ona iftira atacak kadar onursuz değilim."
languages.original_text: {n}Elina clicks her tongue loudly.{/n} "Regent Aaronto is guilty of mass killings, intimidation, inhuman torture, abetting Tisiphone, and raising her heir. His crimes are many, but this one is not among them. I'd love to see his head on the chopping block, but honour prohibits me from slandering him in a trial before the {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Elina dilini duyulacak şekilde şaklatıyor.{/n} "Naip Aaronto toplu katliamlardan, sindirme operasyonlarından, insanlık dışı işkencelerden, Tisiphone'ye yardakçılık etmekten ve onun vârisini yetiştirmekten suçludur. İşlediği suçları saymaya kalksak sonu gelmez ama bu, onlardan biri değil. Kellesini odun kesme kütüğü üzerinde görmeyi çok isterim ama ona {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g} önündeki bir yargılamada iftira atacak kadar da onursuz değilim."
traits.speaker: NaviRadicalLeader
